divisionsigil.configuration.title: Division Sigil Configs
divisionsigil.configuration.axeRestoreTi: Interval between Healing Axe hunger restoration
divisionsigil.configuration.axeHungerAmo: Hunger to restore for Healing Axe
divisionsigil.configuration.axeSaturatio: Saturation to restore for Healing Axe
divisionsigil.configuration.axeHealAmoun: Mob health to restore for Healing Axe
divisionsigil.configuration.axeLifeCost: Health cost to use Healing Axe
divisionsigil.configuration.divisionSigi: Division Sigil # of uses on activation
message.divisionsigil.midnight_condition: The Division Sigil ritual must be performed at midnight.
message.divisionsigil.sky_condition: The Division Sigil ritual must be performed in clear view of the sky.
message.divisionsigil.redstone_condition: The enchantment table must be surrounded by 8 adjacent redstone wire blocks.
message.divisionsigil.dirt_condition: The enchantment table must be on a 5 by 5 surface of dirt or equivalent blocks.
message.divisionsigil.kill_condition: The sacrifice conditions are right. Kill any mob near the table to activate the division sigil(s).
message.divisionsigil.stabilization.reds: There is missing or misplaced redstone dust (incorrect blocks are highlighted).
message.divisionsigil.stabilization.ches: There needs to be 4 chests in the cardinal directions, with 4 spaces between them and the beacon, with the correct items (check JEI).
message.divisionsigil.stabilization.kill: The sacrifice conditions are right. Now, sacrifice one that would sacrifice itself.
message.divisionsigil.stabilization.sieg: The End Siege has started. Kill %d siege monsters to stabilization the Sigil
tooltip.divisionsigil.instability_warnin: ERROR: Divide by diamond (explodes in %s seconds when crafted)
